title: kalpakAmbikE shrI
sahitya:
kalpakAmbikE shrI.  rAgA:  bhairavi.  tALA:  rUpaka
 
P1:  kalpakAmbikE shrI kalpakAmbikE
 2:  karuNai shei
 3:  tiru mayilai mAnagarinil vaLarum


anupallavi

  mAlayan marai tEDa ninra kapAlIshvaran magizhum jAyE


caraNam    tAyinum parindaruL purindiDum mA dayAnNidhi nIyE
tuya anbargaLum munivarum tudi sheiyya varum abhaya varadE
shailEndran magizh tanayE kailAsAcala nilayE
